citations.narrative:
The wooden and concrete structures in the enclosures housing 13 domestic cats are not impervious to moisture. Building
surfaces in contact with animals in outdoor housing facilities must be impervious to moisture. The wooden structures need
to be treated or replaced with material that is impervious to moisture.
Correct by March 28, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
3.4(c) 
   
Outdoor housing facilities. 
The wooden and concrete structures in the enclosures housing 13 domestic cats are not impervious to moisture. Building 
surfaces in contact with animals in outdoor housing facilities must be impervious to moisture. The wooden structures need 
to be treated or replaced with material that is impervious to moisture. 
Correct by March 28, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
